Side Effects: Nauseous_ stomach cramps_ bloated stomach_ general body discomfort_ slight dizziness_ painful build-up to vomitting BUT not vomitting!
Comments: I have SLE Lupus. I was prescribed this medicine in the hope that it will help to clear up my persistant dry cough that I have had for over a year now.After just one day of taking this medicine I have absolutely no intention whatsoever to continue with it and intend to inform the prescribing hospital consultant first thing tomorrow morning. I dont know why this drug is on the market.It is sheer poison!!
